SUMMARY: NESTED | FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD DETAIL: FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD

dreisoft.tresos.autosar2.api.ecuresource
Class EcuResourceProperties

java.lang.Object
  dreisoft.tresos.autosar2.api.ecuresource.EcuResourceProperties

public class EcuResourceProperties
extends java.lang.Object

Contains hardware resource properties for the specified target/derivate. An instance of this class represents a resource file that is registered via the dreisoft.tresos.autosar2.api.plugin.ecuresource extension-point. The EcuResourceProperties matching the current project or model can be queried with getEcuResourceProperties(dreisoft.tresos.datamodel2.api.model.DCtxt, java.lang.String, java.lang.String) : 

 EcuResourceProperties properties = EcuResourceProperties.getEcuResourceProperties( ctxt, target, derivate );
The values of the resource file can be queried via
  • has(java.lang.String)
  • get(java.lang.String)
  • list(java.lang.String)
Target, derviate and the parameters set via the extension-point can be queried with:
  • getTarget()
  • getDerivate()
  • getParameters()

Copyright (C) Elektrobit Automotive GmbH - All rights reserved

Since:
2008.a

Parameters:
target - ECU target name.
derivate - ECU derivate name.
moduleId - The module id.

Parameters:

Method Detail

getEcuResourceProperties

public static EcuResourceProperties getEcuResourceProperties(DCtxt ctxt,
                                                             java.lang.String target,
                                                             java.lang.String derivate)
This method is used to query a fitting EcuResourceProperties instance from the registered ones.

Parameters:
ctxt - The context via which to query the parameters
target - The target of the project
derivate - The derivate of the project
Returns:
The fitting EcuProperties or null

parameters

public static java.util.Vector<java.lang.String> parameters(DCtxt ctxt,
                                                            java.lang.String target,
                                                            java.lang.String derivate,
                                                            java.lang.String paramName)
Returns a list of values for the given parameter name taken from any ecu resource properties definitions that are relevant for the given target, derivate and optional moduleId if defined in the extension.

Parameters:
ctxt - The current datamodel context to identify configured modules.
target - The relevant target to filter the available resource properties to.
derivate - The relevant derivate to filter the available resource properties to.
paramName - The parameter name to get the values for.
Returns:
Vector of string parameter values or null if the given parameter name doesn't exist.
Since:
2009.a

has

public boolean has(java.lang.String key)
Determines whether the given key exists in the parameter list.

Parameters:
key - The key to check
Returns:
true if the key exists in the list, false otherwise

2008.a

list

public java.util.List<java.lang.String> list(java.lang.String key)
Returns a list of strings associated with the given key or null. the values are separated by a , in the properties file.

Parameters:
key - The key to get the list for
Returns:
Vector of strings associated with the given key or null
Since:
2008.a

getTarget

public java.lang.String getTarget()
The target set via the target attribute of the extension-point.

Returns:
the target (never null - even for those which are registered with "*" - "*" will immediately be resolved to the requested target)
Since:
2008.a

getDerivate

public java.lang.String getDerivate()
The derivate set via the derivate attribute of the extension-point.

Returns:
the derivate (may be null, "*" will immediately be resolved to the requested target)

2008.a
